content.rendered:
Directed by Rohit Shetty

Written by Sanchit Bedre. Vidhi Ghodgaonkar. Yunus Sajawal. Farhad Samji. Rohit Shetty

Star Akshay Kumar (Veer Sooryavanshi). Katrina Kaif (Ria Sooryavanshi). Ajay Devgn (Bajirao Singham). Ranveer Singh (Sangram Bhalerao (Simmba)). Jackie Shroff (Omar Hafeez). Jaaved Jaaferi (Kabir Shroff (as Javed Jaffrey)). Gulshan Grover (Qadar Usmani). Javad Ramezani (Jak). Abhimanyu Singh (Riyaaz Hafeez / Vinod Thapar). Nikitin Dheer (Mukhtar Ansari). Kumud Mishra (Bilal Ahmed). Vivan Bhatena (Vivaan). Ashish Warang (Aashish Tambe). Mrunal Jain (Raza Hafeez). Sikandar Kher (John Mascarenhas). Anuradha Chandan (Mrs. Gupta (Rhea’s mother)). Sukanya Dhanda (Mrs. Usmani (Kadar’s wife)). Anuva Gupta (Rhea’s friend). Kishor Mahabole (Mr. Sooryavanshi (Veer’s father)). Rajendra Gupta (Naeem Khan). Shruti Ulfat (Mrs. Hafeez (Omar’s wife)). Shaji Chaudhary (Omar’s henchman). Pradeep Kabra (Riyaaz’s henchman). Jagdish Kansara (Mr. Gupta (Rhea’s father)). Sofiya Khan (Lily Dias). Krishna Kotian (ATS Officer). Meenal Sahu (Mrs. Thapar (Riyaaz’s wife)). Farukh Saeed (Doctor). Vidhaan Sharma (Aryan Sooryavanshi). Haelyn Shastri (ATS Officer Malvika Gupta).Jayant Gadekar . Prateek Shrestha (Sanat). Deep Joshi (Deep Joshi). Rajiv Kumar Aneja (Police commissioner (as Rajiv Kumar A.)). Micky Makhija (Commissioner).Asseem Merchant . Devidas Chippa (ATS officer). Umakant Patil (Umakanth Bhide). Jayant Sawarkar (Maulvi Sahab)

Language Hindi

Producers Aruna Bhatia. Sahni Bob. Inderjit Chadha. Hiroo Johar. Karan Johar. Akshay Kumar. Apoorva Mehta. Rohit Shetty. Anil Thakur

Production Dharma Productions. Reliance Entertainment. Rohit Shetty Productions
